mapper.insert: /*useGeneratedKeys="true" 返回表示插入元组的主键值给传入的dish的id属性*/ insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user,status) values (#{name},#{categoryId},#{price},#{image},#{description},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser},#{status})
